name: Scintillating Ooze
description: A formidable Large ooze creature with a slippery, gelatinous form that shimmers with vibrant colors.
memorable: Its ability to create smaller oozlings when injured makes it a persistent threat.
goals: To engage in close combat and incapacitate or dissolve foes it comes into contact with.
relations: It may be encountered alongside other oozes or in areas with hazardous liquid environments.
environment: Typically found in dark, damp places such as caves, sewers, or swamps.
strengths: Immunity to multiple damage types, including acid and slashing, and condition immunities make it a tough adversary.
weaknesses: Exceptionally low Intelligence and Charisma limit its ability to strategize or communicate.
attacks: Utilizes powerful pseudopod and thrashing attacks that deal both bludgeoning and acid damage.
most_powerful_ability: The ability to shed smaller oozlings when damaged, creating additional threats on the battlefield.
senses: Blindsight allows it to perceive its surroundings within a range of 120 feet without vision.
skills: Has a perception skill of -2, reflecting its low Wisdom.
additional_information: Can traverse difficult surfaces, including ceilings.
Does not require sleep, allowing for continuous activity.
Can create oozlings when subjected to specific damage types.
Possesses a combination of melee attack versatility.
test_queries: large acid creature that splits into smaller oozes
monster with corrosive touch and climbing ability
gelatinous being immune to slashing damage
formidable ooze encountered in dark caves
